value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33

value.title: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression
value.excerpt: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression Vertipaq is the database and engine that runs on top of Power BI and PowerPivot. value.title: After Union Two tables, data goes to the wrong column with Power BI DAX?
